content.raw:
Can we also add options for blacs plugins and lyse settings, using default values, and put labscript programs in alphabetical order? i.e. change the bottom of example.ini to:

```
[BLACS/plugins]
connection_table = True
delete_repeated_shots = False
general = True
memory = False
progress_bar = False
theme = True

[lyse]
autoload_config_file = %(app_saved_configs)s\lyse\lyse.ini
integer_indexing = False

[runmanager]
autoload_config_file = %(app_saved_configs)s\runmanager\runmanager.ini
output_folder_format = %%Y\%%m\%%d\{sequence_index:04d}
filename_prefix_format = %%Y-%%m-%%d_{sequence_index:04d}
```

This way users can expeditiously see which plugins/options are available to turn on.

Can we also add options for blacs plugins and lyse settings, using default values, and put labscript programs in alphabetical order? i.e. change the bottom of example.ini to:

[BLACS/plugins]
connection_table = True
delete_repeated_shots = False
general = True
memory = False
progress_bar = False
theme = True

[lyse]
autoload_config_file = %(app_saved_configs)s\lyse\lyse.ini
integer_indexing = False

[runmanager]
autoload_config_file = %(app_saved_configs)s\runmanager\runmanager.ini
output_folder_format = %%Y\%%m\%%d\{sequence_index:04d}
filename_prefix_format = %%Y-%%m-%%d_{sequence_index:04d}

This way users can expeditiously see which plugins/options are available to turn on.
